thread.title: Sponsorship Sales Associate - Pro Sports

title: Sponsorship Sales Associate - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sponsorship Sales Associate Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: The Sponsorship Sales Associate will be responsible for assisting the sales department by putting together and selling sponsorship packages.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
